author: Dorian Kachur
text:
I am seeking information on how organizations determine the prioritization of various great ideas that require a technological solution, whether those are co-ordinated through a central process, and what that process looks like.  The goal would be to ensure that the organization is working on the right projects in the right order to ensure good corporate alignment.
Thanks.
title: Project prioritization
